reference.title: Configuration files
reference.shortdesc: Describes the various files that you can use to configure the spdf3 plugin.

section.p: To configure the spdf3 plugin you modify several files:

dd.p: Defines a number of XSL variables and params used throughout the spdf3 transforms; these include margin sizes, font specifications, and so on.

Usually you don't need to do anything to this file. It's responsible for defining a number of properties used by the plugin. However, some users on 64-bit machines have experienced problems with Java and the -d64 option, which this file sets when it detects a 64-bit architecture.

If the Open Toolkit fails and you see in the log:[java] Could not create the Java virtual machine. [java] Unrecognized optio: -d64 you will need to edit build_init.xml and find the lines (around line 85): <condition property="jvmArchFlag" value="-d64" else=""> Change the value attribute so that it assigns a null string (just like the else attribute): <condition property="jvmArchFlag" value="" else="">
